creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens and cook up a storm!

Learn from the best of the best and polish your cube-blasting abilities through mouth-watering levels! Enhance your skills, solve puzzles, evolve into an amazing chef, and get awarded 3 stars!

Make the best out of the ingredients and boosts at your disposal to take on the challenge to become a coveted Culinary Genius™!

Features:

- START AS AN APPRENTICE – And learn the ropes with Gordon Ramsay!
- PLAY MOUTH-WATERING LEVELS – With more added every two weeks!
- DISHES TO DELIGHT – Master those appetizing recipes in your quest to conquer the kitchen!
- BEEFY BOOSTERS – Unlock those boosters and access more levels!
- CHALLENGE YOURSELF – Put your skills to the test to build your Win Streak and overcome challenging puzzles!
- MASTER – And become an amazing chef, a real Culinary Genius™!
- PICK UP AND PLAY – Anytime, any place even offline!
descriptionShort: Have a blast with Gordon Ramsay's CHEF BLAST - a Culinary Genius™ game!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It’s a Festive Taste Sensation

In our latest new update we have added THREE NEW Recipes in time for winter! With each one unlocking every two weeks, Master each dish before moving onto the next one and create the ultimate festive dinner.

But that’s not all, we have reworked the Recipe Challenge: collect stars by passing levels to unlock the Featured Dish’s real world recipe.

Update Today for new levels, new dishes and much more!

title: Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast

creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens and cook up a storm!

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and become a top chef through mouth-watering levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius!

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive Gordon Ramsay dishes - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of his personal all-time favorites.

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest game around!

Features:
BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from Gordon Ramsay and become a master chef!
PLAY LUSCIOUS LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!
DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing recipes in your quest to conquer the kitchen!
BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more levels!
TEASE YOUR BRAIN - with challenging & strategic gameplay!
EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!
PICK UP AND PLAY - anytime, anyplace and even offline!

Name, voice, image and likeness of Gordon Ramsay provided under licence from Humble Pie Media Limited for Studio Ramsay. Gordon Ramsay is a trade mark or registered trademark of Gordon Ramsay. All Rights Reserved.

descriptionShort: Have a blast with Gordon Ramsay's CHEF BLAST - a Culinary Genius™ game!

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and become a top chef through mouth-watering levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius!

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive Gordon Ramsay dishes - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of his personal all-time favorites.

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest game around!

Features:
BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from Gordon Ramsay and become a master chef!
PLAY LUSCIOUS LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!
DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing recipes in your quest to conquer the kitchen!
BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more levels!
TEASE YOUR BRAIN - with challenging & strategic gameplay!
EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!
TEAM UP - with friends and other players to send and receive lives!
TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become the best in the Chef Blast world!
PICK UP AND PLAY - anytime, anyplace and even offline!

Name, voice, image and likeness of Gordon Ramsay provided under licence from Humble Pie Media Limited for Studio Ramsay. Gordon Ramsay is a trade mark or registered trademark of Gordon Ramsay. All Rights Reserved.

Culinary Genius © & TM Humble Pie Rights Ltd 2017-2021
© 2020-2021, Outplay Entertainment Limited. All rights reserved.

title: Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast

creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens and cook up a storm!

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and become a top chef through mouth-watering levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius!

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive Gordon Ramsay dishes - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of his personal all-time favorites.

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest game around!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
THE KITCHEN MAKEOVER UPDATE

Gordon wants to see your kitchen, but it needs work: Turn a kitchen nightmare into a dream, with 221 beautiful upgrades from 13 kitchen themes - get customizing!

The exclusive Crispy Bacon-Butter Basted Turkey with Maple-Roasted Root Vegetables dish is a tall order; can you unlock it?

It’s getting colder, but the competition is heating up in festive-themed Winter Star Team Prize and Team Trophy Tournament

20 new levels to master

title: Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast

creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens and cook up a storm! Customize your kitchen as you progress through the game, earn game cash by completing levels and spend it to renovate your kitchen.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and become a top chef through mouth-watering levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius!

Turn a kitchen nightmare into your dream kitchen as you solve puzzles and progress through levels with Gordon!

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen. Earn game cash for completing levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive Gordon Ramsay dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites.

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest game around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from Gordon Ramsay and become a master chef!

PLAY LUSCIOUS LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through levels!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing recipes in your quest to conquer the kitchen!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become the best in the Chef Blast world!

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and become a top chef through mouth-watering levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius!

Turn a kitchen nightmare into your dream kitchen as you solve puzzles and progress through levels with Gordon!

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen. Earn game cash for completing levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive Gordon Ramsay dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites.

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest game around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from Gordon Ramsay and become a master chef!

PLAY LUSCIOUS LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through levels!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing recipes in your quest to conquer the kitchen!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become the best in the Chef Blast world!

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!
_____

Enjoying Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast? Learn more:

Follow us:
facebook.com/ChefBlast/
twitter.com/ChefBlastGame

Visit us: www.outplay.com
_____

© 2020-2021, Outplay Entertainment Limited. All rights reserved.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
VALENTINE’S DAY UPDATE

Fall in love with Gordon Ramsay’s cooking all over again:

Impress that special someone; unlock the exclusive Chef Ramsay 'Salted Caramel Profiteroles with Chocolate-Raspberry' recipe by completing a Valentine-inspired challenge

Add a little romance to your kitchen; unlock two charming Valentine kitchen decorations by playing each week between 1st-15th Feb

20 new, exciting levels that you’ll LOVE

THE LIP-SMACKING LAMB UPDATE

Chef Ramsay has cooked up an exciting, brand new Recipe Challenge – unlock the luscious new Lamb Rump with Burnt Leek, Pea Puree and Crushed Jersey Royal Potatoes recipe now

Topping things off; a healthy serving of 20 tasty new levels to keep you blasting

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
THE SOUP DU JOUR UPDATE

Time for a tasty new challenge! Can you unlock Chef Ramsay’s rich and creamy ‘Cauliflower Soup and Ham Cheese Toastie’ recipe?

Bring home the bacon with the new Piggy Bank feature: Complete levels to fill it with coins, then crack it open and unlock your savings with a special offer purchase that will save you heaps

And to top it off, we’ve cooked up 20 new levels to keep you blasting

Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new free puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens by cooking up a storm! Customize your kitchen as you progress through this match-3 kitchen game, earn game cash by completing levels and spend it to renovate your kitchen. Win amazing rewards and create your own recipe portfolio to cook with your friends in our cooking game. Play our exciting free cooking games and blast delicious food! Chef Blast brings you a match-3 makeover & cooking games experience all in one puzzle game.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and reach the top through mouth-watering puzzle levels! Find the smartest way to solve these kitchen puzzle games, crack high scores, and earn match 3 three stars. Become a world chef in your own kitchen and enjoy this exciting free puzzle adventure game.Compete with your friends and show them your cooking games skills as you win the masterchef title in this puzzle survival game!

Turn a kitchen nightmare restoration into your dream kitchen game as you solve match-3 puzzles games and progress through level games with Gordon! Play now this match-3 puzzle games free!

Compete in new weekly events, including Baking Bingo, a fun free bingo game:

BAKING BINGO: Feeling lucky, Chef? Give Gordon’s Baking Bingo a spin and win big prizes. Bake cupcakes and match them to your customer’s order to unlock fantastic rewards in this fun, free bingo game.

HOT STOVE LEAGUE: Join Chef Ramsay on his new cooking show! Compete against other chefs by solving levels in as few attempts as possible and top the leaderboard to win tasty treats!

MARKET DAY: Blast blocks marked with Gordon's seal of approval to collect stickers and exchange them at the market for amazing prizes.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius in our puzzle kitchen games.

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen makeover. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen makeover. Earn game cash for completing match 3 levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations with these kitchen games features.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites. Discover a match-3 cooking games like no other!

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest puzzle food games around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from the best and become a master chef cooking master!

PLAY LUSCIOUS PUZZLE LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through match-3 level games!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing Gordon Ramsay chef games recipes in your quest to conquer this puzzle games!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more puzzle levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive cooking recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become a World Chef in our match-3 puzzle adventure games !

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!
_____

Enjoying Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast? Learn more:

Follow us:
facebook.com/ChefBlast/
twitter.com/ChefBlastGame

Visit us: www.outplay.com
_____

Name, voice, image, and likeness of Gordon Ramsay provided under license from Humble Pie Media Limited for Studio Ramsay. Gordon Ramsay is a trade mark or registered trademark of Gordon Ramsay. All Rights Reserved.

© 2020-2022, Outplay Entertainment Limited. All rights reserved.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don't miss out on the latest update! Join Gordon Ramsay in the kitchen and collect a fresh recipe and play new levels.
Introducing minigames to Gordon Ramsay’s Chef Blast! You can now cook dishes in-game by matching next to the required ingredients! Careful, you only have so long to complete each challenge…
 
- Time Attack Minigames have arrived
- Fresh Pea and Mint Risotto recipe
- 20 new levels that we think you’ll love.

Update now and enjoy!

title: Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast

creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new free puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens by cooking up a storm! Customize your kitchen as you progress through this match-3 kitchen game, earn game cash by completing levels and spend it to renovate your kitchen. Win amazing rewards and create your own recipe portfolio to cook with your friends in our cooking game. Play our exciting free cooking games and blast delicious food! Chef Blast brings you a match-3 makeover & cooking games experience all in one puzzle game.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and reach the top through mouth-watering puzzle levels! Find the smartest way to solve these kitchen puzzle games, crack high scores, and earn match 3 three stars. Become a world chef in your own kitchen and enjoy this exciting free puzzle adventure game.Compete with your friends and show them your cooking games skills as you win the masterchef title in this puzzle survival game!

Turn a kitchen nightmare restoration into your dream kitchen game as you solve match-3 puzzles games and progress through level games with Gordon! Play now this match-3 puzzle games free!

Compete in new weekly events, including Baking Bingo, a fun free bingo game:

BAKING BINGO: Feeling lucky, Chef? Give Gordon’s Baking Bingo a spin and win big prizes. Bake cupcakes and match them to your customer’s order to unlock fantastic rewards in this fun, free bingo game.

HOT STOVE LEAGUE: Join Chef Ramsay on his new cooking show! Compete against other chefs by solving levels in as few attempts as possible and top the leaderboard to win tasty treats!

MARKET DAY: Blast blocks marked with Gordon's seal of approval to collect stickers and exchange them at the market for amazing prizes.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius in our puzzle kitchen games.

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen makeover. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen makeover. Earn game cash for completing match 3 levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations with these kitchen games features.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites. Discover a match-3 cooking games like no other!

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest puzzle food games around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from the best and become a master chef cooking master!

PLAY LUSCIOUS PUZZLE LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through match-3 level games!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing Gordon Ramsay chef games recipes in your quest to conquer this puzzle games!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more puzzle levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive cooking recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become a World Chef in our match-3 puzzle adventure games !

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!
_____

title: Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast

creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Blast your way through Gordon Ramsay's new free puzzle game! Tap matching cubes to blast them to smithereens by cooking up a storm! Customize your kitchen as you progress through this match-3 kitchen game, earn game cash by completing levels and spend it to renovate your kitchen. Win amazing rewards and create your own recipe portfolio to cook with your friends in our cooking game. Play our exciting free cooking games and blast delicious food! Chef Blast brings you a match-3 makeover & cooking games experience all in one puzzle game.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and reach the top through mouth-watering puzzle levels! Find the smartest way to solve these kitchen puzzle games, crack high scores, and earn match 3 three stars. Become a world chef in your own kitchen and enjoy this exciting free puzzle adventure game.Compete with your friends and show them your cooking games skills as you win the masterchef title in this puzzle survival game!

Turn a kitchen nightmare restoration into your dream kitchen game as you solve match-3 puzzles games and progress through level games with Gordon! Play now this match-3 puzzle games free!

Compete in new weekly events, including Baking Bingo, a fun free bingo game:

BAKING BINGO: Feeling lucky, Chef? Give Gordon’s Baking Bingo a spin and win big prizes. Bake cupcakes and match them to your customer’s order to unlock fantastic rewards in this fun, free bingo game.

HOT STOVE LEAGUE: Join Chef Ramsay on his new cooking show! Compete against other chefs by solving levels in as few attempts as possible and top the leaderboard to win tasty treats!

MARKET DAY: Blast blocks marked with Gordon's seal of approval to collect stickers and exchange them at the market for amazing prizes.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius in our puzzle kitchen games.

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen makeover. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen makeover. Earn game cash for completing match 3 levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations with these kitchen games features.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites. Discover a match-3 cooking games like no other!

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest puzzle food games around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from the best and become a master chef cooking master!

PLAY LUSCIOUS PUZZLE LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through match-3 level games!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing Gordon Ramsay chef games recipes in your quest to conquer this puzzle games!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more puzzle levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive cooking recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become a World Chef in our match-3 puzzle adventure games !

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!
_____

Customize your kitchen as you progress through this match-3 kitchen game, earn game cash by completing levels and spend it to renovate your kitchen. Win amazing rewards and create your own recipe portfolio to cook with your friends in our cooking game. Play our exciting free cooking games and blast delicious food! Chef Blast brings you a match-3 makeover & cooking games experience all in one puzzle game.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and reach the top through mouth-watering puzzle levels! Find the smartest way to solve these kitchen puzzle games, crack high scores, and earn match 3 three stars. Become a world chef in your own kitchen and enjoy this exciting free puzzle adventure game.Compete with your friends and show them your cooking games skills as you win the masterchef title in this puzzle survival game!

Turn a kitchen nightmare restoration into your dream kitchen game as you solve match-3 puzzles games and progress through level games with Gordon! Play now this match-3 puzzle games free!

Compete in new weekly events, including Baking Bingo, a fun free bingo game:

BAKING BINGO: Feeling lucky, Chef? Give Gordon’s Baking Bingo a spin and win big prizes. Bake cupcakes and match them to your customer’s order to unlock fantastic rewards in this fun, free bingo game.

HOT STOVE LEAGUE: Join Chef Ramsay on his new cooking show! Compete against other chefs by solving levels in as few attempts as possible and top the leaderboard to win tasty treats!

MARKET DAY: Blast blocks marked with Gordon's seal of approval to collect stickers and exchange them at the market for amazing prizes.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius in our puzzle kitchen games.

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen makeover. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen makeover. Earn game cash for completing match 3 levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations with these kitchen games features.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites. Discover a match-3 cooking games like no other!

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest puzzle food games around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from the best and become a master chef cooking master!

PLAY LUSCIOUS PUZZLE LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through match-3 level games!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing Gordon Ramsay chef games recipes in your quest to conquer this puzzle games!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more puzzle levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive cooking recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become a World Chef in our match-3 puzzle adventure games !

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!
_____

Enjoying Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast? Learn more:

Follow us:
facebook.com/ChefBlast/
twitter.com/ChefBlastGame

Visit us: www.outplay.com
_____

© 2020-2022, Outplay Entertainment Limited. All rights reserved.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Fresh Update for Chef Blast!

- Indulge in the sinful delight of Black Cocoa Donuts, a delectable treat that's perfect for the season.
- Immerse yourself in the cozy charm of the Autumn Theme, where falling leaves and warm colors create the perfect culinary ambiance.
- Take on the challenge with 20 exciting new levels - are you up for the culinary adventure of the season?
Update now and let the autumn flavors sweep you away in Chef Blast!

title:
Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast
1.89.0

creator: Outplay Entertainment Ltd
descriptionHtml:
From celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay comes an explosive and immersive puzzle adventure! Join the Hell's Kitchen and MasterChef star and experience his famously fiery personality as you blast cubes, crush combos, collect exclusive recipes, and renovate a kitchen nightmare into a dream kitchen. :chef’s kiss:

Along the way, you'll unlock amazing rewards and recipe after recipe of Gordon's signature dishes. Think you can handle his Beef Wellington? The Buttermilk Chicken? His Forbidden Fried Rice? Do you think pineapple belongs on pizza? Well now you can put your cooking skills to the test and compete with your friends online to top the Leaderboard and bring home the literal bacon.

It's a whole new level of culinary chaos for home chefs looking to level up, all packed into an explosive free-to-play match and blast puzzle game. The heat is on and only the strong will survive in Gordon’s kitchen!

Three, two, one...let's blast!

Features:

PLAY LUSCIOUS PUZZLE LEVELS – New levels are added every two weeks!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive recipes from star chef Gordon Ramsay as you play through food and ingredient-themed levels and explore new cuisines!

EVENTS A LA CARTE - Prove yourself to Gordon and earn his secret recipes and rewards by winning events, including Hot Stove League, Donkey Race, Baking Bingo, and more!

CUSTOMISE YOUR KITCHEN – Earn in-game cash to personalise your kitchen as you progress through match-3 level games!

TOP THE LEADERBOARD - Compete with other players and teams to become a World Class Chef!

TEAM UP – Join friends and other players to send and receive lives!

NO WI-FI REQUIRED - Anytime, anyplace, even offline! No wi-fi? No problem.

BOMBS & BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters for bigger blasts and juicy combos!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN – Don’t be an idiot sandwich – use strategy to prove you can solve hard levels and win big!

_____


Enjoying Gordon Ramsay: Chef Blast?
Follow us: facebook.com/ChefBlast/
Visit us: www.outplay.com
_____

Win amazing rewards and create your own recipe portfolio to cook with your friends in our cooking game. Play our exciting free cooking games and blast delicious food! Chef Blast brings you a match-3 makeover & cooking games experience all in one puzzle game.

Master your cube-crushing skills to impress Gordon Ramsay and reach the top through mouth-watering puzzle levels! Find the smartest way to solve these kitchen puzzle games, crack high scores, and earn match 3 three stars. Become a world chef in your own kitchen and enjoy this exciting free puzzle adventure game.Compete with your friends and show them your cooking games skills as you win the masterchef title in this puzzle survival game!

Turn a kitchen nightmare restoration into your dream kitchen game as you solve match-3 puzzles games and progress through level games with Gordon! Play now this match-3 puzzle games free!

Compete in new weekly events, including Baking Bingo, a fun free bingo game:

BAKING BINGO: Feeling lucky, Chef? Give Gordon’s Baking Bingo a spin and win big prizes. Bake cupcakes and match them to your customer’s order to unlock fantastic rewards in this fun, free bingo game.

HOT STOVE LEAGUE: Join Chef Ramsay on his new cooking show! Compete against other chefs by solving levels in as few attempts as possible and top the leaderboard to win tasty treats!

MARKET DAY: Blast blocks marked with Gordon's seal of approval to collect stickers and exchange them at the market for amazing prizes.

Blast fast using the Win Streak and climb the leaderboard to claim the title of Culinary Genius in our puzzle kitchen games.

Choose from 200+ upgrades across unique themes to customize all aspects of your kitchen makeover. Complete a theme or mix and match upgrades as you design and decorate a unique in-app kitchen makeover. Earn game cash for completing match 3 levels and spend it on kitchen upgrades and customizations with these kitchen games features.

Build up an amazing Recipe Book featuring exclusive dishes, including an exclusive holiday recipe - available only in Chef Blast - along with some of Gordon’s personal all-time favorites. Discover a match-3 cooking games like no other!

Chop, slice, cook, and bake your way through the tastiest puzzle food games around!

Features:

BECOME THE MASTER - Learn from the best and become a master chef cooking master!

PLAY LUSCIOUS PUZZLE LEVELS - With more added every two weeks!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR KITCHEN - Personalize your kitchen as you progress through match-3 level games!

DISHES TO DELIGHT - Master those appetizing Gordon Ramsay chef games recipes in your quest to conquer this puzzle games!

BEEFY BOOSTERS - Unlock those boosters and access more puzzle levels!

TEASE YOUR BRAIN - With challenging & strategic gameplay!

EXCLUSIVE RECIPES – Discover new, exclusive cooking recipes by star chef Gordon Ramsay along with some of his all-time favorites!

TEAM UP - With friends and other players to send and receive lives!

TOP THE LEADERBOARDS - Compete with other players and teams to become a World Chef in our match-3 puzzle adventure games !

PICK UP AND PLAY - Anytime, anyplace, even offline!
